Cause Affliction: Enrage (Dominions 3: Cause Confusion)
 
(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Mindless [mind], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The spell fills the heart of a man with furious anger. The raging unit will attack anything nearby, even friends.
